services: We offer comprehensive IT solutions including Managed IT Support, Cloud Services, Cybersecurity, Network Monitoring, and Software Development. Would you like more details on any specific service?
security: Our security services cover firewall management, endpoint protection, vulnerability assessments, security audits, and incident response. We ensure your business data is fully protected.
monitoring: We provide 24/7 system monitoring, performance tracking, and alert management. Our proactive monitoring ensures minimal downtime and optimal performance for your IT infrastructure.
contact: You can contact our team via phone at 1300 XXX XXX, email at info@shakilit.com.au, or book a consultation using our online form. Which method do you prefer?
pricing: Our IT support plans start from $199/month for small businesses, including 24/7 monitoring, unlimited remote support, and security management. Interested in a custom quote?
assessment: Our free IT health check includes a full security audit, performance review, and custom recommendations. I can help schedule a session with Shakil. What time works best for you?
emergency: For urgent IT issues, please call 1300 XXX XXX immediately. Our emergency line is monitored 24/7 for managed clients. Are you experiencing a critical issue right now?
response: We guarantee less than 2-hour response times for all managed clients, with 24/7 emergency support available. Same-day onsite visits are available in Melbourne metro. Would you like more details on our SLA?
